In a conversation with Daniel Gross, Partner at Y Combinator, Baidu’s COO & Group President, Qi Lu, discusses the appeal to join Baidu – the structural and technological advantage for AI development – and how both the company and the environment in the US and China are different. Lu emphasizes the generational legacy of Baidu, the advantages Baidu and China as an environment have over other markets, and the company’s largest international counterpart to become the center of gravity for AI development.

Baidu’s COO, Qi Lu Discusses AI with Daniel Gross, Partner, Y Combinator
